data.actual_result: Discord hangs momentarily before crashing and restarting.
data.expected_result: Dictation should work in text input fields as it does when you are not in a voice channel or call.
data.short_description: Invoking macOS' native dictation while in a voice channel or call causes Discord to crash (possibly T2 chip Mac's only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a voice channel or call. - Select a text input field (e.g. "Message #channel" or "Search"). - Invoke dictation through Edit > Start Dictation or the shortcut.
